Aaron Relph / Product Designer

I’m a Product Designer based in San Francisco. Currently, I’m at GitHub on the business team helping teams work better, together. Previously I was designing at Gumroad helping creators earn a living doing what they love.

I design with usability, accessibility and simplicity in mind. I'm most interested in building meaningful products and solving real problems that have a positive impact on the people who use it.

Occasionally I can be found Tweeting words, posting pixels to Dribbble and Instagram and pushing code to GitHub. Say hi
